name: Wooden Force Gem
description: Force gems that can be revealed with the Fire Rod, with different types and sizes.

fields.name: Gem Type
fields.description: Defines the type of force gem, either wooden or ice.

0.name: Wooden
0.description: The force gem is of the wooden type.

1.name: Ice
1.description: The force gem is of the ice type.

fields.name: Gem Color/Size
fields.description: Defines the color and size of the force gem, each representing a different value.
